pages.text: $(li)Tamed Wolfs and Foxhounds can be equipped with Wolf Armors which gives extra protection to them.$(br)$(li)First sit your Tamed Wolf or Foxhound, then shift right click on it while you are holding any kind of Wolf Armor on your hand.
pages.title: Wolf Armors

pages.text: $(br)$(li)Finally place the Wolf Armor in the Wolf Armor Slot.$(br)$(li)There are exists 5 types of Wolf Armors:$(br)$(li)Leather Wolf Armor$(li)Iron Wolf Armor $(li)Golden Wolf Armor$(li)Netherite Wolf Armor$(li)Netherite Wolf Armor$(br2)Insert a picture of Wolfs with differents Wolf Armors
$(li)The Leather Wolf Armor gives 5 points of defense.$(br)$(li)This makes it the most basic armor which can be equipped to your Tamed Wolf.
$(li)The Gold Wolf Armor gives 8 points of defense.$(br)$(li)This makes it a better choice than the Leather Wolf Armor.
$(li)The Iron Wolf Armor gives 12 points of defense.$(br)$(li)This makes it a better choice than the Golden Wolf Armor.
$(li)The Diamond Wolf Armor gives 16 points of defense and 2 points of Armor Toughness.$(br)$(li)This makes it a better choice than the Iron Wolf Armor.
$(li)The Netherite Wolf Armor gives 20 points defense and 3 points of Armor Toughness.$(br)$(li)This makes it a better choice than the Diamond Wolf Armor.
